1using System;
2using System.Collections.Generic;
3using System.Linq;
4using Microsoft.Xna.Framework;
5using Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics;
6using ReLogic.Content;
7using Terraria.GameContent;
8using Terraria.GameContent.Events;
9using Terraria.GameContent.Liquid;
10using Terraria.Graphics;
11using Terraria.Graphics.Shaders;
12using Terraria.ID;
13using Terraria.ModLoader;
14using Terraria.UI;
15
16namespace Terraria.DataStructures;
17
18public static class PlayerDrawLayers
19{
20 private const int DEFAULT_MAX_SPRITES = 200;
21
22 private static SpriteDrawBuffer spriteBuffer;
23
25 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer.Transformation TorsoGroup = new VanillaPlayerDrawTransform(DrawPlayer_extra_TorsoPlus, DrawPlayer_extra_TorsoMinus);
26
28 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer.Transformation MountGroup = new VanillaPlayerDrawTransform(DrawPlayer_extra_MountPlus, DrawPlayer_extra_MountMinus, TorsoGroup);
29
31 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer JimsCloak = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("JimsCloak", DrawPlayer_01_2_JimsCloak, TorsoGroup);
32
34 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer MountBack = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("MountBack", DrawPlayer_02_MountBehindPlayer);
35
37 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer Carpet = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("Carpet", DrawPlayer_03_Carpet);
38
40 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer PortableStool = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("PortableStool", DrawPlayer_03_PortableStool);
41
43 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer ElectrifiedDebuffBack = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("ElectrifiedDebuffBack", DrawPlayer_04_ElectrifiedDebuffBack, TorsoGroup);
44
46 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer ForbiddenSetRing = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("ForbiddenSetRing", DrawPlayer_05_ForbiddenSetRing, TorsoGroup);
47
49 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer SafemanSun = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("SafemanSun", DrawPlayer_05_2_SafemanSun, TorsoGroup);
50
52 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer WebbedDebuffBack = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("WebbedDebuffBack", DrawPlayer_06_WebbedDebuffBack, TorsoGroup);
53
55 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer LeinforsHairShampoo = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("LeinforsHairShampoo", DrawPlayer_07_LeinforsHairShampoo, TorsoGroup, isHeadLayer: true);
56
58 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer Backpacks = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("Backpacks", DrawPlayer_08_Backpacks);
59
61 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer Tails = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("Tails", DrawPlayer_08_1_Tails, TorsoGroup);
62
64 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer Wings = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("Wings", DrawPlayer_09_Wings);
65
67 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer HairBack = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("HairBack", DrawPlayer_01_BackHair, TorsoGroup, isHeadLayer: true);
68
70 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer BackAcc = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("BackAcc", DrawPlayer_10_BackAcc, TorsoGroup);
71
73 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer HeadBack = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("HeadBack", DrawPlayer_01_3_BackHead, TorsoGroup, isHeadLayer: true);
74
76 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer BalloonAcc = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("BalloonAcc", DrawPlayer_11_Balloons);
77
79 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer Skin = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("Skin", DrawPlayer_12_Skin);
80
82 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer Leggings = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("Leggings", DrawPlayer_13_Leggings, null, isHeadLayer: false, (PlayerDrawSet drawinfo) => !drawinfo.drawPlayer.wearsRobe || drawinfo.drawPlayer.body == 166);
83
85 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer Shoes = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("Shoes", DrawPlayer_14_Shoes);
86
88 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer Robe = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("Robe", DrawPlayer_13_Leggings, null, isHeadLayer: false, (PlayerDrawSet drawinfo) => drawinfo.drawPlayer.wearsRobe && drawinfo.drawPlayer.body != 166);
89
91 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer SkinLongCoat = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("SkinLongCoat", DrawPlayer_15_SkinLongCoat, TorsoGroup);
92
94 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer ArmorLongCoat = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("ArmorLongCoat", DrawPlayer_16_ArmorLongCoat, TorsoGroup);
95
97 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer Torso = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("Torso", DrawPlayer_17_Torso, TorsoGroup);

110

113
115 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer FaceAcc = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("FaceAcc", DrawPlayer_22_FaceAcc, TorsoGroup, isHeadLayer: true);
116
118 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer MountFront = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("MountFront", DrawPlayer_23_MountFront, TorsoGroup);
119
121 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer Pulley = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("Pulley", DrawPlayer_24_Pulley, TorsoGroup);
122
124 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer JimsDroneRadio = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("JimsDroneRadio", DrawPlayer_JimsDroneRadio, TorsoGroup);
125
127 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer FrontAccBack = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("FrontAccBack", DrawPlayer_32_FrontAcc_BackPart, TorsoGroup);
128
130 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer Shield = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("Shield", DrawPlayer_25_Shield, TorsoGroup);
131
133 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer SolarShield = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("SolarShield", DrawPlayer_26_SolarShield, MountGroup);
134
136 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer ArmOverItem = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("ArmOverItem", DrawPlayer_28_ArmOverItem, TorsoGroup);
137
139 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer HandOnAcc = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("HandOnAcc", DrawPlayer_29_OnhandAcc, TorsoGroup);

142 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer BladedGlove = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("BladedGlove", DrawPlayer_30_BladedGlove, TorsoGroup);
143
145 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer ProjectileOverArm = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("ProjectileOverArm", DrawPlayer_31_ProjectileOverArm);
146
148 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer FrozenOrWebbedDebuff = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("FrozenOrWebbedDebuff", DrawPlayer_33_FrozenOrWebbedDebuff);
149
151 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer ElectrifiedDebuffFront = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("ElectrifiedDebuffFront", DrawPlayer_34_ElectrifiedDebuffFront);
152
154 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer IceBarrier = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("IceBarrier", DrawPlayer_35_IceBarrier);
155
157 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer CaptureTheGem = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("CaptureTheGem", DrawPlayer_36_CTG);
158
160 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer BeetleBuff = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("BeetleBuff", DrawPlayer_37_BeetleBuff);
161
163 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer EyebrellaCloud = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("EyebrellaCloud", DrawPlayer_38_EyebrellaCloud);
164
166 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer FrontAccFront = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("FrontAccFront", DrawPlayer_32_FrontAcc_FrontPart, null, isHeadLayer: false, null, new PlayerDrawLayer.Multiple
167 {
168 {
169 new PlayerDrawLayer.Between(FaceAcc, MountFront),
170 (PlayerDrawSet drawinfo) => drawinfo.drawFrontAccInNeckAccLayer
171 },
172 {
173 new PlayerDrawLayer.Between(BladedGlove, ProjectileOverArm),
174 (PlayerDrawSet drawinfo) => !drawinfo.drawFrontAccInNeckAccLayer
175 }
176 });
177
179 public static readonly PlayerDrawLayer HeldItem = new VanillaPlayerDrawLayer("HeldItem", DrawPlayer_27_HeldItem, null, isHeadLayer: false, null, new PlayerDrawLayer.Multiple
180 {
181 {
182 new PlayerDrawLayer.Between(BalloonAcc, Skin),
183 (PlayerDrawSet drawinfo) => drawinfo.weaponDrawOrder == WeaponDrawOrder.BehindBackArm
184 },
185 {
186 new PlayerDrawLayer.Between(SolarShield, ArmOverItem),
187 (PlayerDrawSet drawinfo) => drawinfo.weaponDrawOrder == WeaponDrawOrder.BehindFrontArm
188 },
189 {
190 new PlayerDrawLayer.Between(BladedGlove, ProjectileOverArm),
191 (PlayerDrawSet drawinfo) => drawinfo.weaponDrawOrder == WeaponDrawOrder.OverFrontArm
192 }
193 });
194
195 internal static IReadOnlyList<PlayerDrawLayer> VanillaLayers = FixedVanillaLayers.Concat(new PlayerDrawLayer[2] { FrontAccFront, HeldItem }).ToArray();
196
197 internal static IReadOnlyList<PlayerDrawLayer> FixedVanillaLayers => new PlayerDrawLayer[45]
198 {
199 JimsCloak, MountBack, Carpet, PortableStool, ElectrifiedDebuffBack, ForbiddenSetRing, SafemanSun, WebbedDebuffBack, LeinforsHairShampoo, Backpacks,
200 Tails, Wings, HairBack, BackAcc, HeadBack, BalloonAcc, Skin, Leggings, Shoes, Robe,
201 SkinLongCoat, ArmorLongCoat, Torso, OffhandAcc, WaistAcc, NeckAcc, Head, FinchNest, FaceAcc, MountFront,
202 Pulley, JimsDroneRadio, FrontAccBack, Shield, SolarShield, ArmOverItem, HandOnAcc, BladedGlove, ProjectileOverArm, FrozenOrWebbedDebuff,
203 ElectrifiedDebuffFront, IceBarrier, CaptureTheGem, BeetleBuff, EyebrellaCloud
204 };
205
206 public static PlayerDrawLayer FirstVanillaLayer => FixedVanillaLayers[0];
207
208 public static PlayerDrawLayer LastVanillaLayer
209 {
210 get
211 {
212 IReadOnlyList<PlayerDrawLayer> fixedVanillaLayers = FixedVanillaLayers;
213 return fixedVanillaLayers[fixedVanillaLayers.Count - 1];
214 }
215 }
216
217 public static PlayerDrawLayer.Between BeforeFirstVanillaLayer => new PlayerDrawLayer.Between(null, FirstVanillaLayer);
218
219 public static PlayerDrawLayer.Between AfterLastVanillaLayer => new PlayerDrawLayer.Between(LastVanillaLayer, null);
220
221 public static void DrawPlayer_extra_TorsoPlus(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
222 {
223 drawinfo.Position.Y += drawinfo.torsoOffset;
224 drawinfo.ItemLocation.Y += drawinfo.torsoOffset;
225 }
226
227 public static void DrawPlayer_extra_TorsoMinus(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
228 {
229 drawinfo.Position.Y -= drawinfo.torsoOffset;
230 drawinfo.ItemLocation.Y -= drawinfo.torsoOffset;
231 }
232
233 public static void DrawPlayer_extra_MountPlus(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
234 {
235 drawinfo.Position.Y += (int)drawinfo.mountOffSet / 2;
236 }
237
238 public static void DrawPlayer_extra_MountMinus(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
239 {
240 drawinfo.Position.Y -= (int)drawinfo.mountOffSet / 2;
241 }
242
243 public static void DrawCompositeArmorPiece(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo, CompositePlayerDrawContext context, DrawData data)
244 {
245 //IL_0040: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
246 //IL_0045: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)

248 //IL_0056: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
249 //IL_0069: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
250 //IL_010f: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
251 //IL_0114: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
252 //IL_0120: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
253 //IL_0125: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
254 //IL_0139: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
255 //IL_0087: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
256 //IL_008c: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
257 //IL_0159: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
258 //IL_015e: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
259 //IL_01ec: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
260 //IL_0269: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
261 //IL_026e: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
262 //IL_0279: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
263 //IL_027e: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
264 //IL_0284: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
265 //IL_0289: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
266 //IL_028e: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
267 //IL_02a2: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
268 //IL_02aa: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
269 //IL_02b5: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
270 //IL_02c6: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
271 //IL_02d1: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
272 //IL_030c: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
273 //IL_0314: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
274 //IL_031f: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
275 //IL_0330: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
276 //IL_033b: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
277 //IL_00c4: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
278 //IL_00c5: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
279 //IL_00c7: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
280 //IL_00cc: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
281 //IL_0198: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
282 //IL_019a: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
283 //IL_019c: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
284 //IL_01a1: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
285 //IL_03da: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
286 //IL_03df: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
287 //IL_03f3: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
288 //IL_0425: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
289 //IL_0427: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
290 drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Add(data);
291 switch (context)
292 {
293 case CompositePlayerDrawContext.BackShoulder:
294 case CompositePlayerDrawContext.BackArm:
295 case CompositePlayerDrawContext.FrontArm:
296 case CompositePlayerDrawContext.FrontShoulder:
297 {
298 if (((Color)(ref drawinfo.armGlowColor)).PackedValue == 0)
299 {
300 break;
301 }
302 DrawData item2 = data;
303 item2.color = drawinfo.armGlowColor;
304 Rectangle value2 = item2.sourceRect.Value;
305 value2.Y += 224;
306 item2.sourceRect = value2;
307 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.body == 227)
308 {
309 Vector2 position2 = item2.position;
310 Vector2 vector2 = default(Vector2);
311 for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++)
312 {
313 ((Vector2)(ref vector2))._002Ector((float)Main.rand.Next(-10, 10) * 0.125f, (float)Main.rand.Next(-10, 10) * 0.125f);
314 item2.position = position2 + vector2;
315 if (j == 0)
316 {
317 drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Add(item2);
318 }
319 }
320 }
321 drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Add(item2);
322 break;
323 }
324 case CompositePlayerDrawContext.Torso:
325 {
326 if (((Color)(ref drawinfo.bodyGlowColor)).PackedValue == 0)
327 {
328 break;
329 }
330 DrawData item = data;
331 item.color = drawinfo.bodyGlowColor;
332 Rectangle value = item.sourceRect.Value;
333 value.Y += 224;
334 item.sourceRect = value;
335 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.body == 227)
336 {
337 Vector2 position = item.position;
338 Vector2 vector = default(Vector2);
339 for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
340 {
341 ((Vector2)(ref vector))._002Ector((float)Main.rand.Next(-10, 10) * 0.125f, (float)Main.rand.Next(-10, 10) * 0.125f);
342 item.position = position + vector;
343 if (i == 0)
344 {
345 drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Add(item);
346 }
347 }
348 }
349 drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Add(item);
350 break;
351 }
352 }
353 if (context == CompositePlayerDrawContext.FrontShoulder && drawinfo.drawPlayer.head == 269)
354 {
355 Vector2 position3 = drawinfo.helmetOffset + new Vector2((float)(int)(drawinfo.Position.X - Main.screenPosition.X - (float)(drawinfo.drawPlayer.bodyFrame.Width / 2) + (float)(drawinfo.drawPlayer.width / 2)), (float)(int)(drawinfo.Position.Y - Main.screenPosition.Y + (float)drawinfo.drawPlayer.height - (float)drawinfo.drawPlayer.bodyFrame.Height + 4f)) + drawinfo.drawPlayer.headPosition + drawinfo.headVect;
356 DrawData item3 = new DrawData(TextureAssets.Extra[214].Value, position3, drawinfo.drawPlayer.bodyFrame, drawinfo.colorArmorHead, drawinfo.drawPlayer.headRotation, drawinfo.headVect, 1f, drawinfo.playerEffect);
357 item3.shader = drawinfo.cHead;
358 drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Add(item3);
359 item3 = new DrawData(TextureAssets.GlowMask[308].Value, position3, drawinfo.drawPlayer.bodyFrame, drawinfo.headGlowColor, drawinfo.drawPlayer.headRotation, drawinfo.headVect, 1f, drawinfo.playerEffect);
360 item3.shader = drawinfo.cHead;
361 drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Add(item3);
362 }
363 if (context == CompositePlayerDrawContext.FrontArm && drawinfo.drawPlayer.body == 205)
364 {
365 Color color = default(Color);
366 ((Color)(ref color))._002Ector(100, 100, 100, 0);
367 ulong seed = (ulong)(drawinfo.drawPlayer.miscCounter / 4);
368 int num = 4;
369 for (int k = 0; k < num; k++)
370 {
371 float num2 = (float)Utils.RandomInt(ref seed, -10, 11) * 0.2f;
372 float num3 = (float)Utils.RandomInt(ref seed, -10, 1) * 0.15f;
373 DrawData item4 = data;
374 Rectangle value3 = item4.sourceRect.Value;
375 value3.Y += 224;
376 item4.sourceRect = value3;
377 item4.position.X += num2;
378 item4.position.Y += num3;
379 item4.color = color;
380 drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Add(item4);
381 }
382 }
383 }

385 public static void DrawPlayer_01_BackHair(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
386 {
387 //IL_008e: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
388 //IL_0099: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
389 //IL_009e: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
390 //IL_00a4: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
391 //IL_00a9: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
392 //IL_00af: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
393 //IL_00b4: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
394 //IL_00b9: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
395 //IL_00f0: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
396 //IL_00f2: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
397 //IL_00fd: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
398 //IL_010e: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
399 //IL_0119: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
400 //IL_0162: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
401 //IL_0164: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
402 //IL_016f: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
403 //IL_0180: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
404 //IL_018b: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
405 if (!drawinfo.hideHair && drawinfo.backHairDraw)
406 {
407 Vector2 position = new Vector2((float)(int)(drawinfo.Position.X - Main.screenPosition.X - (float)(drawinfo.drawPlayer.bodyFrame.Width / 2) + (float)(drawinfo.drawPlayer.width / 2)), (float)(int)(drawinfo.Position.Y - Main.screenPosition.Y + (float)drawinfo.drawPlayer.height - (float)drawinfo.drawPlayer.bodyFrame.Height + 4f)) + drawinfo.drawPlayer.headPosition + drawinfo.headVect + drawinfo.hairOffset;
408 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.head == -1 || drawinfo.fullHair || drawinfo.drawsBackHairWithoutHeadgear)
409 {
410 DrawData item = new DrawData(TextureAssets.PlayerHair[drawinfo.drawPlayer.hair].Value, position, drawinfo.hairBackFrame, drawinfo.colorHair, drawinfo.drawPlayer.headRotation, drawinfo.headVect, 1f, drawinfo.playerEffect);
411 item.shader = drawinfo.hairDyePacked;
412 drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Add(item);
413 }
414 else if (drawinfo.hatHair)
415 {
416 DrawData item2 = new DrawData(TextureAssets.PlayerHairAlt[drawinfo.drawPlayer.hair].Value, position, drawinfo.hairBackFrame, drawinfo.colorHair, drawinfo.drawPlayer.headRotation, drawinfo.headVect, 1f, drawinfo.playerEffect);
417 item2.shader = drawinfo.hairDyePacked;
418 drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Add(item2);
419 }
420 }
421 }

423 public static void DrawPlayer_02_MountBehindPlayer(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
424 {
425 //IL_0037: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
426 //IL_003d: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
427 //IL_0043: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
428 //IL_006c: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
429 //IL_0072: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
430 //IL_0078: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
431 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.mount.Active)
432 {
433 DrawMeowcartTrail(ref drawinfo);
434 DrawTiedBalloons(ref drawinfo);
435 drawinfo.drawPlayer.mount.Draw(drawinfo.DrawDataCache, 0, drawinfo.drawPlayer, drawinfo.Position, drawinfo.colorMount, drawinfo.playerEffect, drawinfo.shadow);
436 drawinfo.drawPlayer.mount.Draw(drawinfo.DrawDataCache, 1, drawinfo.drawPlayer, drawinfo.Position, drawinfo.colorMount, drawinfo.playerEffect, drawinfo.shadow);
437 }
438 }

440 public static void DrawPlayer_03_Carpet(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
441 {
442 //IL_0012: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
443 //IL_0017: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
444 //IL_00a4: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
445 //IL_00d8: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
446 //IL_00e2: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
447 //IL_0108: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
448 //IL_0113: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
449 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.carpetFrame >= 0)
450 {
451 Color colorArmorLegs = drawinfo.colorArmorLegs;
452 float num = 0f;
453 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.gravDir == -1f)
454 {
455 num = 10f;
456 }
457 DrawData item = new DrawData(TextureAssets.FlyingCarpet.Value, new Vector2((float)(int)(drawinfo.Position.X - Main.screenPosition.X + (float)(drawinfo.drawPlayer.width / 2)), (float)(int)(drawinfo.Position.Y - Main.screenPosition.Y + (float)(drawinfo.drawPlayer.height / 2) + 28f * drawinfo.drawPlayer.gravDir + num)), (Rectangle?)new Rectangle(0, TextureAssets.FlyingCarpet.Height() / 6 * drawinfo.drawPlayer.carpetFrame, TextureAssets.FlyingCarpet.Width(), TextureAssets.FlyingCarpet.Height() / 6), colorArmorLegs, drawinfo.drawPlayer.bodyRotation, new Vector2((float)(TextureAssets.FlyingCarpet.Width() / 2), (float)(TextureAssets.FlyingCarpet.Height() / 8)), 1f, drawinfo.playerEffect, 0f);
458 item.shader = drawinfo.cCarpet;
459 drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Add(item);
460 }
461 }
462
463 public static void DrawPlayer_03_PortableStool(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
464 {
465 //IL_0083: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
466 //IL_0088: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
467 //IL_0089: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
468 //IL_008a: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
469 //IL_0099: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
470 //IL_009e: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
471 //IL_00a3: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
472 //IL_00a7: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
473 //IL_00a8: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
474 //IL_00af: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
475 //IL_00bf: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
476 //IL_00c6: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
477 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.portableStoolInfo.IsInUse)
478 {
479 Texture2D value = TextureAssets.Extra[102].Value;
480 Vector2 position = default(Vector2);
481 ((Vector2)(ref position))._002Ector((float)(int)(drawinfo.Position.X - Main.screenPosition.X + (float)(drawinfo.drawPlayer.width / 2)), (float)(int)(drawinfo.Position.Y - Main.screenPosition.Y + (float)drawinfo.drawPlayer.height + 28f));
482 Rectangle rectangle = value.Frame();
483 Vector2 origin = rectangle.Size() * new Vector2(0.5f, 1f);
484 DrawData item = new DrawData(value, position, rectangle, drawinfo.colorArmorLegs, drawinfo.drawPlayer.bodyRotation, origin, 1f, drawinfo.playerEffect);
485 item.shader = drawinfo.cPortableStool;
486 drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Add(item);
487 }
488 }
489
490 public static void DrawPlayer_04_ElectrifiedDebuffBack(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
491 {
492 //IL_00c8: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
493 //IL_00d3: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
494 //IL_00d8: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
495 //IL_0103: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)

826 public static bool DrawPlayer_08_PlayerVisuallyHasFullArmorSet(PlayerDrawSet drawinfo, int head, int body, int legs)
827 {
828 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.head == head && drawinfo.drawPlayer.body == body)
829 {
830 return drawinfo.drawPlayer.legs == legs;
831 }
832 return false;
833 }

1235 if (((Enum)drawinfo.playerEffect).HasFlag((Enum)(object)(SpriteEffects)1))
1236 {
1237 num2 = bodyFrame.Width - 2;
1238 num4 = -2;
1239 }
1240 for (int i = 0; i < num3; i++)
1241 {
1242 value.X = bodyFrame.X + 2 * i;
1243 Color immuneAlpha = drawinfo.drawPlayer.GetImmuneAlpha(LiquidRenderer.GetShimmerGlitterColor(top: true, (float)i / 16f, 0f), drawinfo.shadow);
1244 immuneAlpha *= (float)(int)((Color)(ref drawinfo.colorArmorBody)).A / 255f;
1245 item = new DrawData(TextureAssets.GlowMask[332].Value, vec + new Vector2((float)(num2 + i * num4), 0f), value, immuneAlpha, drawinfo.drawPlayer.bodyRotation, drawinfo.bodyVect, 1f, drawinfo.playerEffect);
1246 item.shader = drawinfo.cBack;
1247 drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Add(item);
1248 }
1249 }
1250 }

2172 }
2173
2174 internal static bool IsBottomOverridden(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
2175 {
2176 if (ShouldOverrideLegs_CheckPants(ref drawinfo))
2177 {
2178 return true;
2179 }
2180 if (ShouldOverrideLegs_CheckShoes(ref drawinfo))
2181 {
2182 return true;
2183 }
2184 return false;
2185 }
2186
2187 private static bool ShouldOverrideLegs_CheckPants(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
2188 {
2189 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.legs > 0)
2190 {
2191 return ArmorIDs.Legs.Sets.OverridesLegs[drawinfo.drawPlayer.legs];
2192 }
2193 return false;
2194 }
2195
2196 private static bool ShouldOverrideLegs_CheckShoes(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
2197 {
2198 int shoe = drawinfo.drawPlayer.shoe;
2199 if (shoe > 0)
2200 {
2201 return ArmorIDs.Shoe.Sets.OverridesLegs[shoe];
2202 }
2203 return false;
2204 }

2611 {

2613 {

2616 {

2618 }
2619 }
2620 }

2622 {

2625 }
2626 }
2627 else if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.legs == 140)
2628 {

2630 {

2637 }

2798 num2 = 6;

2805 case 215:

2808 num4 = 2;

2843 }

2857 }

2995 public static void DrawPlayer_16_ArmorLongCoat(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
2996 {
2997 //IL_0314: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
2998 //IL_031f: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)

3003 //IL_0345: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
3004 //IL_0356: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
3005 //IL_0361: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
3006 //IL_027c: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
3007 int num = -1;
3008 switch (drawinfo.drawPlayer.body)
3009 {
3010 case 200:
3011 num = 149;
3012 break;
3013 case 202:
3014 num = 151;
3015 break;
3016 case 201:
3017 num = 150;
3018 break;
3019 case 209:
3020 num = 160;
3021 break;
3022 case 207:
3023 num = 161;
3024 break;
3025 case 198:
3026 num = 162;
3027 break;
3028 case 182:
3029 num = 163;
3030 break;
3031 case 168:
3032 num = 164;
3033 break;
3034 case 73:
3035 num = 170;
3036 break;
3037 case 52:
3038 num = ((!drawinfo.drawPlayer.Male) ? 172 : 171);
3039 break;
3040 case 187:
3041 num = 173;
3042 break;
3043 case 205:
3044 num = 174;
3045 break;
3046 case 53:
3047 num = ((!drawinfo.drawPlayer.Male) ? 176 : 175);
3048 break;
3049 case 210:
3050 num = ((!drawinfo.drawPlayer.Male) ? 177 : 178);
3051 break;
3052 case 211:
3053 num = ((!drawinfo.drawPlayer.Male) ? 181 : 182);
3054 break;
3055 case 218:
3056 num = 195;
3057 break;
3058 case 222:
3059 num = ((!drawinfo.drawPlayer.Male) ? 200 : 201);
3060 break;
3061 case 225:
3062 num = 206;
3063 break;
3064 case 236:
3065 num = 221;
3066 break;
3067 case 237:
3068 num = 223;
3069 break;
3070 case 89:
3071 num = 186;
3072 break;
3073 case 81:
3074 num = 169;
3075 break;
3076 }
3077 if (num != -1)
3078 {
3079 Main.instance.LoadArmorLegs(num);
3080 if (drawinfo.isSitting && num != 195)
3081 {
3082 DrawSittingLongCoats(ref drawinfo, num, TextureAssets.ArmorLeg[num].Value, drawinfo.colorArmorBody, drawinfo.cBody);
3083 return;
3084 }
3085 DrawData item = new DrawData(TextureAssets.ArmorLeg[num].Value, new Vector2((float)(int)(drawinfo.Position.X - Main.screenPosition.X - (float)(drawinfo.drawPlayer.legFrame.Width / 2) + (float)(drawinfo.drawPlayer.width / 2)), (float)(int)(drawinfo.Position.Y - Main.screenPosition.Y + (float)drawinfo.drawPlayer.height - (float)drawinfo.drawPlayer.legFrame.Height + 4f)) + drawinfo.drawPlayer.legPosition + drawinfo.legVect, drawinfo.drawPlayer.legFrame, drawinfo.colorArmorBody, drawinfo.drawPlayer.legRotation, drawinfo.legVect, 1f, drawinfo.playerEffect);
3086 item.shader = drawinfo.cBody;

3088 }

4013 if (num10 >= num11)
4014 {
4015 color6 = Color.Lerp(Color.Transparent, new Color(200, 200, 200, 0), Utils.GetLerpValue(num11, num13, num10, clamped: true));
4016 }
4017 if (num10 >= num13)
4018 {
4019 color6 = Color.Lerp(Color.Transparent, new Color(200, 200, 200, 0), Utils.GetLerpValue(1f, num13, num10, clamped: true));
4020 }
4021 color6 *= drawinfo.stealth * (1f - drawinfo.shadow);
4022 DrawData item2 = new DrawData(TextureAssets.Extra[90].Value, helmetOffset + new Vector2((float)(int)(drawinfo.Position.X - Main.screenPosition.X - (float)(drawinfo.drawPlayer.bodyFrame.Width / 2) + (float)(drawinfo.drawPlayer.width / 2)), (float)(int)(drawinfo.Position.Y - Main.screenPosition.Y + (float)drawinfo.drawPlayer.height - (float)drawinfo.drawPlayer.bodyFrame.Height + 4f)) + drawinfo.drawPlayer.headPosition + drawinfo.headVect - Main.OffsetsPlayerHeadgear[drawinfo.drawPlayer.bodyFrame.Y / drawinfo.drawPlayer.bodyFrame.Height], bodyFrame4, color6, drawinfo.drawPlayer.headRotation, drawinfo.headVect, 1f, drawinfo.playerEffect);

4024 }

4026 {

4094
4095 public static int DrawPlayer_Head_GetTVScreen(Player plr)
4096 {
4097 if (NPC.AnyDanger())
4098 {
4099 return 4;
4100 }
4101 if (plr.statLife <= plr.statLifeMax2 / 4)
4102 {
4103 return 1;
4104 }
4105 if (plr.ZoneCorrupt || plr.ZoneCrimson || plr.ZoneGraveyard)
4106 {
4107 return 0;
4108 }
4109 if (plr.wet)
4110 {
4111 return 2;
4112 }
4113 if (plr.townNPCs >= 3f || BirthdayParty.PartyIsUp || LanternNight.LanternsUp)
4114 {
4115 return 5;
4116 }
4117 return 3;
4118 }
4119
4120 private static int GetHatStacks(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo, int hatItemId)
4121 {
4122 int num = 0;
4123 int num2 = 0;
4124 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.armor[num2] != null && drawinfo.drawPlayer.armor[num2].type == hatItemId && drawinfo.drawPlayer.armor[num2].stack > 0)
4125 {
4126 num += drawinfo.drawPlayer.armor[num2].stack;
4127 }
4128 num2 = 10;
4129 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.armor[num2] != null && drawinfo.drawPlayer.armor[num2].type == hatItemId && drawinfo.drawPlayer.armor[num2].stack > 0)
4130 {
4131 num += drawinfo.drawPlayer.armor[num2].stack;
4132 }
4133 if (num > 2)
4134 {
4135 num = 2;
4136 }
4137 return num;
4138 }

4326

5316 //IL_176d: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
5317 //IL_1771: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
5318 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.JustDroppedAnItem)
5319 {
5320 return;
5321 }
5322 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.heldProj >= 0 && drawinfo.shadow == 0f && !drawinfo.heldProjOverHand)
5323 {
5324 drawinfo.projectileDrawPosition = drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Count;
5325 }
5326 Item heldItem = drawinfo.heldItem;
5327 int num = heldItem.type;
5328 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.UsingBiomeTorches)
5329 {
5330 switch (num)
5331 {
5332 case 8:
5333 num = drawinfo.drawPlayer.BiomeTorchHoldStyle(num);
5334 break;
5335 case 966:
5336 num = drawinfo.drawPlayer.BiomeCampfireHoldStyle(num);
5337 break;
5338 }
5339 }
5340 float adjustedItemScale = drawinfo.drawPlayer.GetAdjustedItemScale(heldItem);
5341 Main.instance.LoadItem(num);
5342 Texture2D value = TextureAssets.Item[num].Value;
5343 Vector2 position = default(Vector2);
5344 ((Vector2)(ref position))._002Ector((float)(int)(drawinfo.ItemLocation.X - Main.screenPosition.X), (float)(int)(drawinfo.ItemLocation.Y - Main.screenPosition.Y));
5345 Rectangle itemDrawFrame = drawinfo.drawPlayer.GetItemDrawFrame(num);
5346 drawinfo.itemColor = Lighting.GetColor((int)((double)drawinfo.Position.X + (double)drawinfo.drawPlayer.width * 0.5) / 16, (int)(((double)drawinfo.Position.Y + (double)drawinfo.drawPlayer.height * 0.5) / 16.0));
5347 if (num == 678)
5348 {
5349 drawinfo.itemColor = Color.White;
5350 }
5351 if (drawinfo.drawPlayer.shroomiteStealth && heldItem.ranged)
5352 {
5353 float num12 = drawinfo.drawPlayer.stealth;
5354 if ((double)num12 < 0.03)
5355 {
5356 num12 = 0.03f;
5357 }

6492 case 3:

6858
6859 public static void DrawPlayer_RenderAllLayers(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
6860 {
6861 //IL_0124: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
6862 List<DrawData> drawDataCache = drawinfo.DrawDataCache;
6863 if (spriteBuffer == null)
6864 {
6865 spriteBuffer = new SpriteDrawBuffer(Main.graphics.GraphicsDevice, 200);
6866 }
6867 else
6868 {
6869 spriteBuffer.CheckGraphicsDevice(Main.graphics.GraphicsDevice);
6870 }
6871 foreach (DrawData item in drawDataCache)
6872 {
6873 if (item.texture != null)
6874 {
6875 item.Draw(spriteBuffer);
6876 }
6877 }
6878 spriteBuffer.UploadAndBind();
6879 DrawData cdd = default(DrawData);
6880 int num = 0;
6881 for (int i = 0; i <= drawDataCache.Count; i++)
6882 {
6883 if (drawinfo.projectileDrawPosition == i)
6884 {
6885 if (cdd.shader != 0)
6886 {
6887 Main.pixelShader.CurrentTechnique.Passes[0].Apply();
6888 }
6889 spriteBuffer.Unbind();
6890 DrawHeldProj(drawinfo, Main.projectile[drawinfo.drawPlayer.heldProj]);
6891 spriteBuffer.Bind();
6892 }
6893 if (i != drawDataCache.Count)
6894 {
6895 cdd = drawDataCache[i];
6896 if (!cdd.sourceRect.HasValue)
6897 {
6898 cdd.sourceRect = cdd.texture.Frame();
6899 }
6900 PlayerDrawHelper.SetShaderForData(drawinfo.drawPlayer, drawinfo.cHead, ref cdd);
6901 if (cdd.texture != null)
6902 {
6903 spriteBuffer.DrawSingle(num++);
6904 }
6905 }
6906 }
6907 spriteBuffer.Unbind();
6908 Main.pixelShader.CurrentTechnique.Passes[0].Apply();
6909 }
6910
6911 private static void DrawHeldProj(PlayerDrawSet drawinfo, Projectile proj)
6912 {
6913 if (!ProjectileID.Sets.HeldProjDoesNotUsePlayerGfxOffY[proj.type])
6914 {
6915 proj.gfxOffY = drawinfo.drawPlayer.gfxOffY;
6916 }
6917 try
6918 {
6919 Main.instance.DrawProjDirect(proj);
6920 }
6921 catch
6922 {
6923 proj.active = false;
6924 }
6925 }
6926
6927 public static void DrawPlayer_RenderAllLayersSlow(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
6928 {
6929 //IL_00e2: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
6930 int num = -1;
6931 List<DrawData> drawDataCache = drawinfo.DrawDataCache;
6932 Effect pixelShader = Main.pixelShader;
6933 Projectile[] projectile = Main.projectile;
6934 SpriteBatch spriteBatch = Main.spriteBatch;
6935 for (int i = 0; i <= drawDataCache.Count; i++)
6936 {
6937 if (drawinfo.projectileDrawPosition == i)
6938 {
6939 if (!ProjectileID.Sets.HeldProjDoesNotUsePlayerGfxOffY[projectile[drawinfo.drawPlayer.heldProj].type])
6940 {
6941 projectile[drawinfo.drawPlayer.heldProj].gfxOffY = drawinfo.drawPlayer.gfxOffY;
6942 }
6943 if (num != 0)
6944 {
6945 pixelShader.CurrentTechnique.Passes[0].Apply();
6946 num = 0;
6947 }
6948 try
6949 {
6950 Main.instance.DrawProj(drawinfo.drawPlayer.heldProj);
6951 }
6952 catch
6953 {
6954 projectile[drawinfo.drawPlayer.heldProj].active = false;
6955 }
6956 }
6957 if (i != drawDataCache.Count)
6958 {
6959 DrawData cdd = drawDataCache[i];
6960 if (!cdd.sourceRect.HasValue)
6961 {
6962 cdd.sourceRect = cdd.texture.Frame();
6963 }
6964 PlayerDrawHelper.SetShaderForData(drawinfo.drawPlayer, drawinfo.cHead, ref cdd);
6965 num = cdd.shader;
6966 if (cdd.texture != null)
6967 {
6968 cdd.Draw(spriteBatch);
6969 }
6970 }
6971 }
6972 pixelShader.CurrentTechnique.Passes[0].Apply();
6973 }
6974
6975 public static void DrawPlayer_DrawSelectionRect(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo)
6976 {
6977 //IL_0014: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
6978 //IL_0015: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
6979 //IL_001a: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
6980 //IL_001f: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
6981 //IL_0020: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
6982 //IL_0025: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
6983 //IL_002a: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
6984 SpriteRenderTargetHelper.GetDrawBoundary(drawinfo.DrawDataCache, out var lowest, out var highest);
6985 Utils.DrawRect(Main.spriteBatch, lowest + Main.screenPosition, highest + Main.screenPosition, Color.White);
6986 }
6987
6988 private static bool IsArmorDrawnWhenInvisible(int torsoID)
6989 {
6990 if ((uint)(torsoID - 21) <= 1u)
6991 {
6992 return false;
6993 }
6994 return true;
6995 }
6996
6997 private static DrawData[] GetFlatColoredCloneData(ref PlayerDrawSet drawinfo, Vector2 offset, Color color)
6998 {
6999 //IL_0030: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
7000 //IL_0035: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
7001 //IL_0036: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
7002 //IL_003b: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
7003 //IL_004a: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
7004 //IL_004b: Unknown result type (might be due to invalid IL or missing references)
7005 int colorOnlyShaderIndex = ContentSamples.CommonlyUsedContentSamples.ColorOnlyShaderIndex;
7006 DrawData[] array = new DrawData[drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Count];
7007 for (int i = 0; i < drawinfo.DrawDataCache.Count; i++)
7008 {
7009 DrawData drawData = drawinfo.DrawDataCache[i];
7010 ref Vector2 position = ref drawData.position;
7011 position += offset;
7012 drawData.shader = colorOnlyShaderIndex;
7013 drawData.color = color;
7014 array[i] = drawData;
7015 }
7016 return array;
7017 }
7018}
